product_name: Keen Presidio Pedal Bike Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Looking for street-smart bike shoes? With their classic oxford lace-up design and cleat compatibility, the Keen Presidio Pedal women's bike shoes are your answer. Shoes feature a 3/4-length thermoplastic urethane cleat tap plate. Supple full-grain leather uppers are water- and stain-resistant with an offset seam at the toe creating a unique styling detail. Contoured EVA foam midsoles buffer feet against shock and fatigue; removable, smooth leather-topped EVA insoles provide additional cushioning and combat odor. Nonmarking carbon rubber outsoles are sticky and offer ample traction in all environments; toe guards protect against bumps and abrasion. Keen Presidio Pedal bike shoes are compatible with SPD, Time, Look, Crank Brothers and Speedplay cleats (not included). Closeout.
short_description: Looking for street-smart bike shoes? With their classic oxford lace-up design and cleat compatibility, the Keen Presidio Pedal women's bike shoes are your answer.
